tier_1_determinative.five_or_more_persons_involved: There are in all 4 accused, including the applicants.
tier_1_determinative.robbery_with_violence: Robbery was committed but no one was injured.
tier_1_determinative.attempt_to_cause_death_or_grievous_hurt: No attempt to cause death or grievous hurt was reported.
tier_1_determinative.common_intention: The applicants along with accused no.1 committed the offence under common intention.
tier_1_determinative.actus_reus_description: Unknown persons entered the house of Navnath Haridas Metkari and committed robbery.

tier_2_material.recovery_of_stolen_property: There is recovery of the gold ornaments at the instance of the present applicants.

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: The incident took place at the house of Navnath Haridas Metkari.
tier_3_contextual.police_investigation_details: The investigation is complete, and the charge-sheet has been filed.

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Adesh Anil Kale & Umesh Anil Kale vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.appellant_or_petitioner: Adesh Anil Kale, Umesh Anil Kale
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Ms.Poonam Patil i/b Mr. Manindra Pandey
tier_4_procedural.sections_invoked: Sections 395, 452, 457, 380, 506 read with 34 of the IPC
tier_4_procedural.appellate_court_decision: The application for bail is allowed with conditions.

residual_details.additional_facts: The applicants are young, 19 years of age, and have no criminal antecedents.
residual_details.sentencing_details: The applicants are released on bail with conditions, including furnishing a P.R. Bond of Rs.15,000/- each.
